product_name: Phorm S 410 Max Saddle - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Part of the Phorm Touring Series, this men's saddle is designed with an upright riding position in mind, with added cushioning under the sit bones to deliver comfort during long days on the bike.
short_description: Part of the Phorm Touring Series, this men's saddle is designed with an upright riding position in mind, with added cushioning under the sit bones to deliver comfort during long days on the bike.
